channel.title: June 28, 2021 :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script Hello, and welcome to the week four announcements for cis 527 in summer 2021. I’m a bit informal this week because I decided not to set up all my recording equipment just to do my announcements this week, but I hope you can bear with me. So this week, we’ve got lab three, it’s due tonight by 7pm. This lab does require live grading.
